com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface ILink

All Superinterfaces:
ICoreConstants, IIdObject, IPCObject, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Link
public interface ILink
extends IIdObject

A Link represents a relationship between two nodes. The link in itself does not have any meaning. A type can be given to the node to give it some meaning.

Author:
rema and sajid / Michelle Bachler

getOriginalID

java.lang.String getOriginalID()
Returns the object's original imported id. When importing maps we need to make sure that objects with the same id end up as the same project compendium object.

Returns:
String, the original identifier of this object
